predicate.note: Frames file for 'outfit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'equip'.

example.name: pretty easy
example.text: Allied-Signal Aerospace Co. received a $65 million contract *trace* to outfit Continental Airlines' 393 planes with the Bendix/King Traffic Alert and Collision Avoidance System.
example.arg: the Bendix/King Traffic Alert and Collision Avoidance System
